page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: Houses cluster around the village of The Lea, especially under and on the side of Bailey Point and at Hoovers Lane.There is very little ribbon development just new houses along the Pontshill road.There is infilling of new houses in the village itself.Two Councils projects -one in 1950 of Swedish type at Stockholm Place are now houses privately owned.The second project was at Knightshill and adjacent the Old Peoples bungalows at Saunders Close. Both Estates have Street Lighting although there is no other except on the modern Housing at Mitcheldean.The old cottages have 18 inch single walls of stone.There is a beautifull privately owned residential caravan site which is very mainly occupied by Senior citizens from large towns who have retired to this peaceful site.
